title: can a rioter post my chat logs and tell me why i deserved chat restriction??
body:
i just got out of a game where i think 3 of my teammates all reported me for various reasons like intent feeding (wasnt intent feeding they were just salty) and toxic even tho i didn't say a single toxic thing to my team or the enemy team that whole game. was i talking too much? yea. was i toxic tho? no. not at all, and i was surprised when i went into my next game and found i had chat restriction ahh the power of false reports.

Edit: here are my chat logs 

Game 1
Hells bellsX: ill be honest with u im not even trying
Hells bellsX: i just want this game to be over so i can play zed
Hells bellsX: yea so i dont really care whats happening i just want the game to be over
Hells bellsX: autofilled bot
Hells bellsX: u get what u get
Hells bellsX: and if im wasting time lets all agree to ff at 15 ok :P
Hells bellsX: well u said i was wasting time so naturally the solution would be to ff
Hells bellsX: no comment?
Hells bellsX: did i make too much sense?
Hells bellsX: pls stop double ulting me
Hells bellsX: its rude
Hells bellsX: rip jhin 
Hells bellsX: jannas being soooo rude
Hells bellsX: they muted me cuz im not even trying...makes sense
Hells bellsX: well since u said it so rudly
Hells bellsX: no
Hells bellsX: for?
Hells bellsX: u know they can look at the reply of the game and clearly see im nto inting
Hells bellsX: so go ahead with ur false reports
Hells bellsX: wait howd i get an asist
Hells bellsX: autofill sucks
Hells bellsX: yawn
Hells bellsX: im proud that u can read
Hells bellsX: what other cool skills u have
Hells bellsX: what exactly am i doing noc
Hells bellsX: sounds like
Hells bellsX: a personal problem
Hells bellsX: and thats a prospective see to me im doing a lot
Hells bellsX: im building items
Hells bellsX: im farming
Hells bellsX: im rooting enemies
Hells bellsX: whoops
Hells bellsX: 0/9 now
Hells bellsX: i was typing lol and didnt have time to move
Hells bellsX: this teams so toxic its ubelievable
Hells bellsX: un*
Hells bellsX: :)
Hells bellsX: im literally slouched back in my chair chillin im not trying
Hells bellsX: just cuz im not trying doesnt mean im inting
Hells bellsX: they see im under fed and they automatically go after me
Hells bellsX: thats how i keep dying
Hells bellsX: no means no
Hells bellsX: if we ffd we coulda ended 15 mins ago
Hells bellsX: i just want this to be over so i can play mid
Hells bellsX: ull live
Hells bellsX: see, toxic
Hells bellsX: u match ur skin
Hells bellsX: really well
Hells bellsX: u are very toxic
Hells bellsX: zed pls
Hells bellsX: my fourth shot > your smite
Hells bellsX: gg wp
Game 2
Hells bellsX: we cant have two off metas on the same team
Hells bellsX: thats not gonna work
Hells bellsX: if i find out i disenchanted my snowday gnar skin im gonna kill myself
Hells bellsX: i didnt realize how small gnars attack range was
Hells bellsX: ok
Hells bellsX: gg
Hells bellsX: what was the point of singed supp
Hells bellsX: to stand there and do nothing?
Hells bellsX: i didnt dive i got pulled
Hells bellsX: are u blind
Hells bellsX: i was no where near the tower
Hells bellsX: gtf outta bot yo i might aswell be 1v2
Hells bellsX: ur useles asf
Hells bellsX: u see i picked an off meta bot so why tf would u pick an off meta support
Hells bellsX: how is that smart
Hells bellsX: ill be less tilted if u left bot
Hells bellsX: go roam
Hells bellsX: dumb
Hells bellsX: i wish they still banned people who play singed support
Hells bellsX: i probably woulda been able to do well IF I HAD A REAL FUCKIN SUPPORT
Hells bellsX: how did ur W still hit me when i jumped out the way
Hells bellsX: im done with this shit fest
Hells bellsX: bye
Hells bellsX: no u did 
Hells bellsX: trash singed support
Hells bellsX: no wonder riot banned that one guy who played singed supp
Hells bellsX: trash bs %%%%% aint do shit all laning phase the only thing he can do is flip someone which requires him to get close
Hells bellsX: which he cant do cuz yall have a blitz
Hells bellsX: fuckin idiot
Hells bellsX: talking to the singed
Hells bellsX: little bastard cant play a champion that takes skill so he mains a brain dead top laner that presses Q really well lol 
Hells bellsX: singed i hate u 
Hells bellsX: trash needs to be stomped out
Hells bellsX: but riot wont do that cuz itll take 3/4th their player base so
Hells bellsX: because gnar adc is genius and it wouldve worked if i had a real support
Hells bellsX: i told singed why tf would u pick an off meta support when i have an off meta adc thats never gonna work
Hells bellsX: anyone can adc if they have a good support
Hells bellsX: i won games with fuckin aurelion sol ap BECAUSE MY SUPPORT WAS DECENT
Hells bellsX: but here? nahh
Hells bellsX: what rank?
Hells bellsX: PFFFFT
Hells bellsX: u know silver is just bronze on steroids?
Hells bellsX: thats nothing to brag about
Hells bellsX: talk to me when ur plat or something
Hells bellsX: golds not even something to brag about
Hells bellsX: only elos that are considered actually good is diamond + 



game 2 actually occurred before game 1 idk why its switched but game 1 was last night and i will not deny i was pretty toxic that game and deserve the reports i got. but on the other hand game 1 i cant see how i was toxic at all, what does saying "im not even trying" count as toxic? or grieving? how? dispite  me saying im not even trying, i clearly am since it takes effort to even play the game when i could've easily just afk'd and probably avoided a chat restriction all together. i got auto-filled into a role i didn't want to play therefore i didn't give the game 100% my all which im pretty sure is not against the rules. Like i said earlier game 2 i completely understand the reason for being reported but the thing is that game didn't trigger my chat restriction, game 1 did. And that game was full of toxic players saying things 10x worse than anything ive said that whole game. false reports should not trigger punishments because i didnt do anything wrong that game except play badly. 
i will be sending in a support ticket. 

another Edit: i meant to say game 2 occurred last night, not game 1. i would fix it but idk how to scroll up in the editing mode to fix any mistakes i made. just know the order in which the games occurred are reversed.

replies.body:
> Hells bellsX: trash bs %%%%% aint do shit all laning phase the only thing he can do is flip someone which requires him to get close
 
Well I'm not going to say that this was the cause....But this was definitely the cause.

> [{quoted}](name=Hydroxlic,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ocrEEIu6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-19T01:18:50.734+0000)
>
> Well I'm not going to say that this was the cause....But this was definitely the cause.

happened a whole day before i got chat restriction, thats is not the cause, the false reports triggered the auto restriction.

Your first game you state how you're not trying, giving up, and just whining about getting auto filled.

What got you a punishment is definitely the hate speech in game 2. And you also singled out your support, dedicating significant amounts of your chat to harassing them.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ocrEEIu6,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-10-19T02:34:57.807+0000)
>
> Your first game you state how you're not trying, giving up, and just whining about getting auto filled.
> 
> What got you a punishment is definitely the hate speech in game 2. And you also singled out your support, dedicating significant amounts of your chat to harassing them.

game 2 came before game 1 as i stated if game 2 was the reason i got punished then i wouldve gotten punished waaaaaaaaaaaay last night. not mid day. please show me where in the rules it says "if a player says theyre not trying report them" ill wait.

Riot does not publish any rules.

If you think whining about not getting your pick then stating you're going to give up is acceptable behavior, then you'll continue through the punishment system until you're banned.

If you just got a chat restriction and used hate speech, you got off lightly.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ocrEEIu6,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2017-10-19T15:35:31.716+0000)
>
> Riot does not publish any rules.
> 
> If you think whining about not getting your pick then stating you're going to give up is acceptable behavior, then you'll continue through the punishment system until you're banned.
> 
> If you just got a chat restriction and used hate speech, you got off lightly.

no where in the game did i ever state that i gave up i said im not even trying now despite that guess what? i still played, i still farmed, i still built items, i still grouped with my team, i still rooted enemies and tried to get assist when i could, i still got a few kills and i still TRIED to avoid death whenever their enemy came for me. 

it shouldn't matter at all that i said im not even trying as long as im playing the goddamn game and not afk or intentionally feeding then there should've been a problem at all. There is nothing anyone can tell me that i did wrong that game because there isn't y'all are being nit picky trying to make up reasons that im in the wrong because the boards us biased as hell. saying "im not even trying" is not giving up its not toxic, is not racist, its not homophobic, its not intentionally feeding and its not afking. it doesn't break any rules at all riot is in the wrong point blank period.

You're saying you're not trying, you're constantly arguing with your teammates, even dying while you type. There's quite a few lines dedicated to how you're not trying to win. Again, if you think that's acceptable behavior, then that's just your opinion.

If you're not trying to win, you are giving up. I can't tell what you did in game, but that's what you said, many many times.
Don't you get sent the chat logs yourself? Rioters only chime in once in a while.

> [{quoted}](name=Jo0o,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ocrEEIu6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-18T23:32:42.450+0000)
>
> Don't you get sent the chat logs yourself? Rioters only chime in once in a while.

ok ill check my email
You'll get them in client after your game is over.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ocrEEIu6,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-18T23:46:18.677+0000)

ok i got it

Show me 1 line that was not toxic.

i can show u several

So you don't see a problem with getting allies who blatantly state they aren't gonna try? They're not even trying... you'd be fine with that, and wouldn't report anyone for just not giving a fuck about putting any effort into winning? Also you try to keep the argument going with "no comment?" "Did I make too much sense?" ... I completely agree with your punishment. Get off league if you don't want to try and would rather argue with people and die because you're typing. The fuck man. 

How is this even questionable? Obviously you get punished for this.

> [{quoted}](name=Telephone Booth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ocrEEIu6,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-19T02:30:31.455+0000)

i wouldnt even care if they're not trying, as long as they dont afk or intent feed im 100% sure everyone doesn't play this game stressing themselves to win in a role they didnt want to play in the first place.

ok, next time ill just afk and let my team 4v5 so i can avoid being punished all together thanks, learned my lesson
